titles.title: A bill to designate the National Museum of Wildlife Art, located at 2820 Rungius Road, Jackson, Wyoming, as the "National Museum of Wildlife Art of the United States".

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary: 1/31/2007--Introduced. Designates the National Museum of Wildlife Art located at 2820 Rungius Road, Jackson, Wyoming, as the "National Museum of Wildlife Art of the United States."
